item.title: First server migration
item.author: Jen-Chieh Shen
item.description: I have always been using AWS as my main web hosting choice. But I have come to the point that I reckon the price and services aren’t something that I need. Therefore, I have decided to switch to another web hosting company just for another taste. The main reasons are listed below: AWS charges you money when you click on their services without notifying the user. I dislike how it functions.
